Class Card

  • java.lang.Object
    • Card

  • public class Card
extends Object
    Holds basic information of a card. Contains relevant getters and setters.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(int cardSuit,
    int cardRank)
        Creates a card with a suit and a rank.
        Parameters:
        cardSuit - a suit numbered 1-4, corresponding to Spades, clubs, hearts, and diamonds.
        cardRank - a rank numbered 1-13, corresponding to ace, 1-10, Jack, Queen, and King.
